Race.SpecificTitle: District Judge -- 19th Judicial District Court, ES 3, Div. F
Judge -- Criminal District Court, Section A
City Marshal -- City Court, City of Shreveport
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 1 of 6 -- 1.13 Mills Continuation - CC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 1 of 6
(Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Shreveport, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and one hundred thirty thousandths (1.130) mills on all property subject to taxation in the City, said mills to represent a .01 mills increase over the 1.120 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2022 pursuant to an election held on April 28, 2018 (an estimated $1,761,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2023 to and including the year 2027, for the purposes of improving, repairing, and maintaining the streets of the City, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Shreveport Proposition No. 2 of 6 -- 0.84 Mills Continuation - CC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 2 of 6
(Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Shreveport, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of eight hundred forty thousandths (0.840) mills on all property subject to taxation in the City, said mills to represent a .01 mills increase over the 0.830 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2022 pursuant to an election held on April 28, 2018 (an estimated $1,309,300 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2023 to and including the year 2027, for the purposes of operating and supplying recreational facilities and appurtenances and maintaining the same, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Shreveport Proposition No. 3 of 6 -- 1.13 Mills Continuation - CC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 3 of 6
(Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Shreveport, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and one hundred thirty thousandths (1.130) mills on all property subject to taxation in the City, said mills to represent a .01 mills increase over the 1.120 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2022 pursuant to an election held on April 28, 2018 (an estimated $1,761,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2023 to and including the year 2027, for the purposes of continuing the salary and wage schedule of the City's employees and for no other purpose?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Shreveport Proposition No. 4 of 6 -- 1.13 Mills Continuation - CC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 4 of 6
(Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Shreveport, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and one hundred thirty thousandths (1.130) mills on all property subject to taxation in the City, said mills to represent a .01 mills increase over the 1.120 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2022 pursuant to an election held on April 28, 2018 (an estimated $1,761,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2023 to and including the year 2027, for the purposes of police and fire personnel and allowance for uniforms and equipment for said departments and for no other purpose?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Shreveport Proposition No. 5 of 6 -- 1.7 Mills Continuation - CC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 5 of 6
(Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Shreveport, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and seven hundred thousandths (1.700) mills on all property subject to taxation in the City, said mills to represent a .01 mills increase over the 1.690 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2022 pursuant to an election held on April 28, 2018 (an estimated $2,649,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2023 to and including the year 2027, for the purposes of providing funds for the City's portion of pensions, employee life insurance and hospitalization plan for City employees?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Shreveport Proposition No. 6 of 6 -- 1.48 Mills Continuation - CC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Shreveport Proposition No. 6 of 6
(Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Shreveport, State of Louisiana (the "City"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of one and four hundred eighty thousandths (1.480) mills on all property subject to taxation in the City, said mills to represent a .01 mills increase over the 1.470 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2022 pursuant to an election held on April 28, 2018 (an estimated $2,307,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2023 to and including the year 2027, for the purposes of providing funds for the City's continuation and maintenance of a "Police Three Platoon System", originally authorized by Article 14, Section 12, of the Louisiana Constitution of 1921?
